snippet: Defending champion Stan Wawrinka breathed a huge sigh of relief and Andy Murray faced a sleepless night after both got bogged down by belligerent Czechs at a sodden French Open on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Defending champion Stan Wawrinka breathed a huge sigh of relief and Andy Murray faced a sleepless night after both got bogged down by belligerent Czechs at a sodden French Open on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Relieved, Murray Teeters on the Brink
headline.main: Wawrinka Relieved, Murray Teeters on the Brink
